已过时的 API

目录

  • 接口
  • 方法
  • 枚举常量
  • Deprecated 接口
    接口
    说明
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ConsumerStats
    use ClientBuilder.openTelemetry(OpenTelemetry) to enable stats
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerInterceptor
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerStats
    use ClientBuilder.openTelemetry(OpenTelemetry) to enable stats
  • Deprecated 方法
    方法
    说明
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Authentication.configure(Map<String, String>)
    This method will be deleted on version 2.0, instead please use configure(String encodedAuthParamString) which is in EncodedAuthenticationParameterSupport for now and will be integrated into this interface.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ClientBuilder.enableTls(boolean)
    use "pulsar+ssl://" in serviceUrl to enable
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ClientBuilder.statsInterval(long, TimeUnit)
     
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Consumer.getLastMessageId()
    Use Consumer.getLastMessageIds() instead.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Consumer.getLastMessageIdAsync()
    Use Consumer.getLastMessageIdsAsync()} instead.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ConsumerBuilder.maxPendingChuckedMessage(int)
    use ConsumerBuilder.maxPendingChunkedMessage(int)
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.MessageRouter.choosePartition(Message<?>)
    since 1.22.0. Please use MessageRouter.choosePartition(Message, TopicMetadata) instead.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerBuilder.intercept(ProducerInterceptor<T>...)
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerBuilder.maxPendingMessagesAcrossPartitions(int)
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.newTableViewBuilder(Schema<T>)
    Use PulsarClient.newTableView(Schema) to build and configure a TableViewBuilder instance
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Schema.AUTO()

    枚举常量
